attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want the anti-social, pro-gang, pro-drugs dance music band stopped.

The previously mentioned band promote a negative side of our soceity that is seriously morally corrupt and provides a negative and violent view of life in England.

The deep bass and fast drums are not made to sound good but are made to upset and disturb the general public.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
